price: 56. Kaadu jinnii kee seehada tuh maginniyyo, yoo yaqbudeenî gidih akke waytek.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqtu al-jina wal-insa illā liyaʿbudūni
